outputFile.comment: The path to save the generated image
priceurl.comment: The url that provides the pricing information from bisq marketplace
useTor.comment: Indicates whether remote calls should use torify for privacy. Experimental
width.comment: The width, in pixels to generate the image.
height.comment: The height, in pixels to generate the image.
sleepInterval.comment: The amount of time, in seconds, the script should wait before data gathering and image creation again
showBigText.comment: Indicates whether the current price should be displayed in large mode in the middle instead of at bottom of image
showBigTextOnTop.comment: If showBigText is enabled, this controls whether the tprice rendered below visual graph or above it in z-order
colorBackground.comment: The background color of the image expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorBisq.comment: The color to use for the Bisq label expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorHeader.comment: The color of the text expressed as a Hexadecial color specifier
colorPriceUp.comment: The color of the text for the current price when rising expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorPriceDown.comment: The color of the text for the current price when declining expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorPriceShadow.comment: The color of the text shadow for the current price expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
